overview_of_class: This course is entirely project driven. Students will build a series of applications together. The class will start with a simple idea and learn just what's needed about various technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to make that idea real. The idea starts simple and moves to a more complicated idea using technology. Building functional prototypes of an idea using the Ruby on Rails web application Framework.
name: Programming Design
title: MEAS DSGN 425-0-20 Programming Design
